Posts.EditableText: When trying to view saved game data I get an error saying that game data in this file is from a different version of Quest-this file format is incompatible with this version. How do I view the saved game data? I've tried loading it in QDK and get an unrecognized file ext. Tried opening with notepad and get gibberish.
Posts.HTML: When trying to view saved game data I get an error saying that game data in this file is from a different version of Quest-this file format is incompatible with this version. How do I view the saved game data? I've tried loading it in QDK and get an unrecognized file ext. Tried opening with notepad and get gibberish.
